page.title: 01Wasteland B`ham
page.content: {At Conway School we are concerned about the wasteland surrounding our school. We visited a wasteland on the edge of Palmerston and Grantham Roads, which backs on to our school. We were horrified to find so much rubbish e.g. glass bottles, rotten food, old toilets and televisions. I wrote to the City Architects Department about the problem to see if the area could be landscaped with the help of the children at Conway.He replied and said he was sorry about the rubbish. He asked the Urban Renewal Architect to take up the points in my letter with the Environmental Health Department. He promised he would write again as soon as he had some answers. I felt very pleased to recieve the letter and glad that somebody was taking some notice about the problem. I would like
